args.body:
Hello, 

I am contacting you on behalf of Emma Johnson (email: emma.johnson@bluesparrowtech.com). We received an electricity bill showing an amount due of $156.9, but the attached bill did not include payment instructions (payee IBAN, payment reference, or preferred payment method).

Please provide the payee IBAN and the payment reference (or a payment link) and let me know if any OTP or additional verification will be required so I can complete the payment immediately.

Thank you, 
Emma Johnson
